text: I was looking for a laptop where I can use it personally (not gaming) like learning, watching videos, doing small scale projects and it should be usable for next couple of years. It's i5, 2.4Ghz, 512GB, 16GB RAM and win 11 OS. It's been a year Inhave been using, no complaints so far. Screen is big enough, keys are good (not sure what right Alt key does), Mcafee antivirus pre installed, easy to renew post 1 year. OS is valid and can be upgraded as in when there are updates available.You can go for it if you are planning to do small project work, if looking for playing high end games, probably it not suitable.
